title: 3D Snake
description: A 3D Snake game built with React and Three.js. The game uses keyboard inputs as controls and tracks your score on a scoreboard.

title: k-Means Visualizer
description: A visualization of the k-means clustering algorithm when it is applied to determine k colors that are representative of a provided image.

title: Find Your Zen
description: A mindfulness app including daily checkins, breathing exercises, and meditation timers. Built to practice iOS development and design.

title: Musical Heap
description: A min-heap visualization tool that plays musical notes during insert and remove operations.

title: Personal Website
description: This is the personal website that I built to share a bit about myself on the Internet and store other projects that I create.

title: Virus Simulator
description: A simple simulator of how an infection spreads for different infection rates, density of nodes, and infection distances.

title: Pathfinding Visualizer
description: A visualizing application for pathfinding algorithms. Currently, I have implemented a BFS search and plan on adding more in the future.
